mapper.insert: insert into base_device ( devicecode, devicename, devicetype, standard, status, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{devicecode}, #{devicename}, #{devicetype}, #{standard}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update base_device set devicecode=#{devicecode}, devicename=#{devicename}, devicetype=#{devicetype}, standard=#{standard}, status=#{status}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
